title: Heat Sink
summary: The Heat Sink is a component which is used in the crafting of Medium Turrets (currently only used for Destroyers) and certain tier IV and V turrets. Heat Sinks are also the only item which requires Water to craft as of the Faction War Update.
full_text:
Heat Sink
The Heat Sink is a component which is used in the crafting of Medium Turrets (currently only used for Destroyers) and certain tier IV and V turrets. Heat Sinks are also the only item which requires Water to craft as of the Faction War Update.
